average_visits.description: Text in the Daily Stats table

clear.description: Button name next to each filter

clear_all.description: Button name underneath filters when multiple filters are applied

daily_stats.description: Heading for the Daily Stats table

day_hover_text.description: Text that appears when hovering over a date link

define_transitions.description: Text of link underneath the Transition Type chart

domain_column_name.description: Name of the Domain column that appears when clicking View Top 100 from the Domains tab

domain_hover_text.description: Text that appears when hovering over a domain link

extension_description.message: Search and analyze your unlimited history.

filter_by_domain.description: Text next to the filter box on the domain tab

filter_by_url.description: Text next to the filter box on the URL tab

go.description: Button name next to the filter box on both the Domains and URLs tabs

import_errors.message: Errors: $ERROR_COUNT$ lines could not be imported

import_ignored_stats.description: summary of visits not imported because they already exist

import_stats.description: summary of imported urls and visits

median_visits.description: Text in the Daily Stats table

not_applicable.description: Short text to indicate a statistic is not applicable for the current filters

num_visits.description: Text that appears in the legend on all bar-graph charts

number_of_visits.description: Chart label on the Time-Series chart

percent_unique_visits.description: Column heading on Unique Visits tab

results_filtered.description: Text that appears at the top after a filter has been applied

return_to.description: Part of a link that takes the user to a previous domain filter

today.description: Link that filters history results to today

today_hover_text.description: Text that displays when hovering over the Today link

top100_days.description: Table heading on the busiest days popup

top100_domains.description: Table heading on the domain popup

top100_urls.description: Table heading on the URL popup

top10_days.description: Table heading for the Busiest Days table

top10_domains.description: Table heading on the domain tab

top10_unique_urls.description: Table heading on the unique urls per domain tab

top10_urls.description: Table heading on the URL tab

unique_url_count.description: Label for the second column of the Unique URLs per Domain table

unique_url_tab_name.description: Name of the Unique URLs tab

url_column_name.description: Name of the URL column that appears when clicking View Top 100 from the URLs tab

url_hover_text.description: Text that appears when hovering over a URL link

url_stats.description: URL statistics shown at the top of the page

view_more.description: Text for the link on each tab that pops up a table showing more results

visit_count.description: Column name on all tables showing statistics

visits_per_day.description: Title of Visits per Day chart, without a rolling average

visits_per_day_rolling_avg.description: Title of Visits per Day chart, with a rolling average

waiting_text.description: Text to display while the user's history is being processed.
waiting_text.message: Please wait while your trends are calculated.
